synonyms: pradyumna—Lord Pradyumna; cakra—disc; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; padma—lotus; dhara—holding; aniruddha—Lord Aniruddha; cakra—disc; gadā—club; śaṅkha—conch; padma-kara—lotus flower in hand.
translation: "Pradyumna holds the disc, conch, club and lotus. Aniruddha holds the disc, club, conch and lotus.
